pkgmetadata.longdescription: Anthy is a free and secure Japanese kana-kanji server. This ebuild includes cannadic as a server-side dictionary, so you don't need any extra package to run it. You can use anthy with app-i18n/uim (XIM, GTK+ immodule) and virtual/emacs (to enable Anthy support for emacs, build this package with emacs USE flag).
